reportInstructions: Click anywhere on the map to report an incident at that location, or use the quick report button to use your current location.
protecting: Protecting the Multiverse, One Report at a Time
name: Name
alreadyHaveAccount: Already have an account? Sign In
dontHaveAccount: Don't have an account? Sign Up
unableLocation: Unable to get your location. Please click on the map to select a location.
geolocationUnsupported: Geolocation is not supported by your browser. Please click on the map to select a location.
speechUnsupported: Speech recognition is not supported in your browser. Please use Chrome or Edge.
speechError: Error with speech recognition. Please try again.
submitFailed: Failed to submit report. Please try again.
voiceHint: Click the microphone to use voice input
